text:
e="preserve">Philip Michael Bosco (September 26, 1930 – December 3, 2018) was an American actor. He was born in Jersey City, New Jersey. He was known for his Tony Award-winning role as Saunders in the 1989 production of "Lend Me a Tenor". He was a regular actor in the "Law & Order" television series and in the FX series "Damages". His last movie role was as Mr. O'Brien in the 2005 comedy movie "Hitch".
Bosco died at his home in Haworth, New Jersey of complications from dementia on December 3, 2018 at the age of 88.
